messages.subject: Re: Re: Table manners/Morocco
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 6/8/2003 8:19:22 PM Eastern Standard Time, ... No, we just spent a week there as part of a bigger trip including Portugal and Spain. We
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 6/8/2003 8:19:22 PM Eastern Standard Time,
Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com writes:

> Double, double take! Did you say Morocco? Did you live there?
> My first born was born in Rabat and I lived there with my dh for
> four years. My kids love it when we eat tagine so they can use
> their fingers with impunity.
>
> And Moroccans used to say that using steel (forks) ruined the
> flavor of the foods and it also cooled the food down too quickly.
> Fingers preserve flavor and heat! :)
>
> Julie B
>
>

No, we just spent a week there as part of a bigger trip including Portugal
and Spain. We stayed in a great little hotel at the medina in Marrakesh, did an
overnight excursion to the Sahara, etc. It was incredible...the place we most
want to go back.


LOVE tagine!!!! I wish desperately we'd bought one while there.
Kathryn


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
